title: JFK: Director's cut. Beyond JFK: the question of the conspiracy
creator_credit: A. Kitman Ho, Ixtlan Corporation and Oliver Stone
brief_description: Starring Kevin Costner, Joe Pesci, Tommy Lee Jones, and Gary Oldman, JFK also features an extensive gallery of appearances by acclaimed actors including Ed Asner, Walter Matthau, Jack Lemmon and Donald Sutherland. This exclusive release has an exta 17 minutes of new footage added, providing more excitement, intrigue and insight into Jim Garrison’s turbulent investigation of President John F. Kennedy’s assassination. Also included on this tape is “Beyond JFK: The question of the conspiracy” a ninety-minute documentary that re-examines the issues raised by the film, featuring interviews with the people who were involved in the Garrison investigation plus astonishing eyewitness accounts. Includes Jim Garrison’s last recorded interview before he died.
